alert.note: Alert for Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 11 at 2:20AM MDT until June 13 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SUNDAY NIGHT FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR UTAH FIRE WEATHER ZONE 487... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR UTAH FIRE WEATHER ZONE 487... The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds, low relative humidity and dry fuels, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Utah, Fire Weather Zone 487 Book Cliffs. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts 25 to 35 mph on Sunday. Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph on Monday. Cold frontal passage late Monday will turn winds to the Northwest. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions could be favorable for easy ignition and rapid spread of fires due to low relative humidity and strong gusty winds.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
